short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that hides and unhides all images from the current webpage with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to read sports news while working? Zara just dropped a new collection and want to check that out?
Afraid of you boss seeing new job positions and other companies logos on your screen?
You can hide all the images on the viewing page with just one click!
Want them back? Just Click on "Load Images" button to see them again!
